Title: Microsoft Cloud for Sustainability: Partnering to Achieve ESG Goals
Author: Microsoft Cloud
Description:
Discover how Microsoft Cloud for Sustainability empowers partners to build innovative solutions that help customers achieve their ESG goals. This video showcases real-world examples of sustainable practices and technologies, highlighting the impact of collaboration and the power of Microsoft Cloud in driving positive environmental and social change.

Learn more about how Microsoft is empowering partners and customers with Microsoft Cloud for Sustainability: https://msft.it/6059SPfsl
